data.title: Divorce on cards for Gauri Pradhan and Hiten Tejwani?
data.meta_description: Small screen's most loved couple, Hiten Tejwani and Gauri Pradhan are heading for divorce.  - Divorce on cards for Gauri Pradhan and Hiten Tejwani?
data.meta_site_name: Latest News, Breaking News, LIVE News, Top News Headlines, Viral Video, Cricket LIVE, Sports, Entertainment, Business, Health, Lifestyle and Utility News | India.Com
data.text:
Small screen's most loved couple, Hiten Tejwani and Gauri Pradhan are heading for divorce.

Small screen’s most loved couple, Hiten Tejwani and Gauri Pradhan are heading for divorce. Yes, you heard that right. All is not well in their married life and hence the couple is planning to part ways. Hold on guys, Hiten and Gauri will file for divorce in their upcoming TV show, Mela.

Hiten and Gauri will team up onscreen for a new telly series called Mela and will play husband and wife on the show. According to the show’s plot, the duo will struggle to bear each other’s company in daily life. Hence, they plan to head for splitsville. Hiten and Gauri will play the characters of Rahul and Neha in the telly show. Gauri Pradhan recently quit Meri Aashiqui Tum Se Hi as her character in the show was not given much preference. She played Falghuni, the mother of the leading female protagonist Ishani in the show. Hiten was also a part of the show but didn’t have a major role either. Hiten is also currently working for & Tv’s Gangaa.

Hiten and Gauri were first paired together in Sony’s Telly soap Kutumb. Their love-hate chemistry garnered them lot of publicity during the show. They later on did Ekta Kapoor’s Kyun Ki Saans Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi. The two tied the knot in the year 2004 and are blessed with twins. Essel Vision Productions’ Mela is a mini TV series and is reported to have 10 episodes. The show will go on air on April 27.
